attributes.action: Make at least one television free to view in every hospital ward.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/want-watch-tv-youre-hospital-14162092

Please imagine how depressing it can be for the elderly and the sick to have to sit, often alone, for days/weeks/months, with nothing to distract them from their plight. It is truly heartbreaking to see those that can pay privately watching TV a few yards from those who cannot. 

I am certain the public will be happy to fund 1 TV per ward, including all repairs necessary.
attributes.background: Throughout the UK most televisions provided to patients in hospital are now charged at £9 per day, per patient, outside of a 3 hour window in the morning. This charge is incredibly depressing when pensioners and other sick people are becoming increasingly poorer in our society.
